column1: its nice to hear from someone with real experience of these beautiful creatures.
another reason to stick with a marriage is that it is just a more beautiful way to live.
my little sister, such a beautiful girl, has had some health problems that have caused her hair to fall out.
they are not only beautiful, but i found something so soothing about all the beautiful xmas lights.
i'd actually classify programming as an art form: if your algorithms aren't beautiful then they're probably not that great.
i'm mama to two beautiful boys one, a freelance writer and caretaker's wife.
i spent the first half of my life wishing i were a beautiful white girl.
scarlett was a beautiful dog, and i'm sure she is in dog heaven where she is retrieving.
yesterday, i found myself gleefully discovering and subsequently picking the beautiful berries along the road to my house.
i had beautiful discussions on facebook and tumblr with two friends.
